Package uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CandiesAccumulator
    Class that is used for keeping statistics for the candies that were either formed or removed during the course of a game.
    CandiesAccumulatorViewer
    Immutable class version of CandiesAccumulator.
    Candy
    Class that contains the information for a candy stored at a certain location on the board.
    CandyGenerator
    Abstract class that is used to generate new candies for the positions to be filled.
    Cell
    Class that represents a single cell (tile) on the board.
    Design
    Class that specifies design for the level including how the initial board layout looks like, the number of moves available and the objective to complete the level.
    GameConstants
    Class that contains many constants used in the game.
    GameState
    Class that contains the state of a game and is responsible for making valid moves on the board and keeping track of the progress and generating the next states of the game.
    GameStateAuxiliaryFunctions
    Class that contains functions that are related to the functionality of the GameState.
    GameStateProgress
    Class that contains the progress of the game state (score, ingredients and jellies remaining).
    GameStateProgressView
    Class that is used to provide an immutable view on a GameStateProgress.
    MatchAnalysis
    Class that contains information about how a match performed.
    Move
    An immutable class that contains a move on the board specified by two positions, the positions of the cells that will be swapped.
    Position
    The coordinates for a position on the board grid addressing a cell.
    PreFilledCandyGenerator
    Candy generator used for testing where it generates candies using the specified lookahead candies specified.
    ProcessStateStats
    Class that contains statistics that concern the: - number of valid moves.
    ProcessStateStatsViewer
    Immutable version of the class ProcessStateStats.
    PseudoRandomCandyGenerator
    Candy Generator that creates a deterministic sequence of candies.
    RandomCandyGenerator
    Generator that simply creates a random candy using the default java random generator.
    RoundStatistics
    Class that contains the statistics for a single move.
    RoundStatisticsManager  
    Scoring
    Class that contains constants and functions related to scoring.
    SingleTileAnalysis
    Class that contains the intervals that contain this tile and have the same CandyColour and forming a match (i.e.
    UnmovableCandyGenerator
    This CandyGenerator ensures that any candy generated will be a candy of unmovable candy type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CandyColour
    Class that contains the possible colours for the candies.
    CandyType
    Class that describe the type of the candy.
    CellType
    CellType determines the type of a cell.
    GameMode
    The game target mode: - HIGHSCORE: the player should reach the score specified as the target.
    ProcessState
    Class that has the possible states of the GameState state diagram in between generations of the board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMoveException
    Exception that will be thrown when the move attempted is invalid.
